name: Climberz
description:
Climberz is an infinite climber, created based on an article series by famous HTML5 game developer Emanuel Feronato with initial game concept by Henrique Silva/WildBeep.

This version is used to demonstrate how Web Monetization can be used in a Defold game to unlock exclusive content to a player with active monetization enabled in the browser.

Source code: https://github.com/defold/game-climberz

#madewithdefold
